texto: and achieves sustained success by: a) understanding and satisfying the needs and expectations of interested parties; b) monitoring changes in the context of the organization; c) identifying possible areas for improvement, learning and innovation; d) defining and deploying policies, strategy and objectives; e) managing its processes and resources; f) demonstrating confidence in its people, leading to increased engagement; g) establishing beneficial relationships with interested parties, such as external providers and other partners. This self-assessment tool uses five maturity levels, which can be extended to include additional levels or otherwise customized as needed.
